body:
Hi everybody,


As a new user of Radiance I'm starting to play with the texture and
pattern functions. I've already read the section of "textures and pattens"
of the book RENDERING WITH RADIANCE. Still, I would like to see to more
examples in order to understand better. Any suggestions? Is there like a
library I could access?
Thanks in advance,




Adriana Lira
Master in Design Studies, 2003
Candidate for Doctor in Design Studies
Harvard Graduate School of Design
___
